content: to the point cheri mcewen special stitches 2d= work a double decrease over three stitches but skip the middle stitch yarn over insert hook in next st pull through yarn over and pull through two loops two loops on hook yarn over and skip the next stitch and work in the stitch that follows yarn over insert hook in indicated stitch pull through yarn over and pull through two loops 3 loops on hook yarn over and pull through all three remaining loops dc3together = double_crochet the next 3 stitches together v-st = double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in indicated stitch or space row 1 ch4 work 12 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook turn row 2 ch3 counts as first double_crochet on each row double_crochet in next st ch1 double_crochet in next st 10 times double_crochet in last st turn row 3 ch3 counts as first double_crochet on each row double_crochet in next st ch2 double_crochet in next st 10 times double_crochet in last st turn row 4 ch3 double_crochet in next st ch2 3dc in next st ch2 9 times double_crochet in last 2 sts turn row 5 ch3 double_crochet in next st ch2 double_crochet in next 3 sts ch2 9 times double_crochet in last 2 sts turn row 6 ch3 double_crochet in next st ch2 double_crochet in next st 3dc in next st double_crochet in next st ch2 9 times double_crochet in last 2 sts turn row 7 ch3 double_crochet in next st ch2 double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts ch2 9 times double_crochet in last 2 sts turn row 8 ch3 double_crochet in next st ch2 double_crochet in next 2 sts 3dc in next st double_crochet in next 2 sts ch2 9 times double_crochet in last 2 sts turn row 9 ch3 double_crochet in next st ch2 double_crochet in next 7 sts ch2 9 times double_crochet in last 2 sts turn row 10 ch3 double_crochet in next st ch2 double_crochet in next 3 sts 3dc in next st double_crochet in next 3 sts ch2 9 times double_crochet in last 2 sts turn row 11 ch3 double_crochet in next st ch2 double_crochet in next 9 sts ch2 9 times double_crochet in last 2 sts turn row 12 ch3 double_crochet in next st ch2 double_crochet in next 4 sts 3dc in next st double_crochet in next 4 sts ch2 9 times double_crochet in last 2 sts turn row 13 ch3 double_crochet in next st ch2 double_crochet in next 11 sts ch2 9 times double_crochet in last 2 sts turn row 14 ch3 double_crochet in next st ch2 double_crochet in next 5 sts 3dc in next st double_crochet in next 5 sts ch2 9 times double_crochet in last 2 sts turn row 15 ch3 double_crochet in next st ch2 double_crochet in next 13 sts ch2 9 times double_crochet in last 2 sts turn row 16 ch3 double_crochet in next st ch2 double_crochet in next 6 sts 3dc in next st double_crochet in next 6 sts ch2 9 times double_crochet
